default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: If you need me for anything, just place an order and pay for it on the dark web and wait for your turn, I don't take commissions from line cutters. However, if you are here for trouble... Think it through. You can never afford that.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Skills? Clear mind, swift movement.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Once a sharp blade is unsheathed, it must be calmed down by blood.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Payment received.

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: What, got something to say?

default.title: Level Start
default.text: A scouting order? Sure.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Order completed.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: ...It's not over yet, the orders I take won't end this way.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: I'll take this life!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Heh... my first disappointed client...

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: ...Don't move the curtains. It's dangerous if people outside see us.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: I take orders from the dark web to make a living, whether it's finding cats or people, taking a life or not, I only take orders based on cost-effectiveness. Personal preferences... don't matter.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: ...Am I lonely? Maybe, but being alone is being safe, and being safe on this side of the world is hard to beat. So, I don't mind being alone.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: I don't think my room is messy, as long as I can find what I need. My knife, rice balls, the computer, the door, and the bed, it's quite obvious, isn't it? This home is much more comfortable than my work sites, I'm quite satisfied.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: The darkness that others fear and despise is the every day I'm accustomed to. I accept it and don't feel sorry for myself. Everyone has their own fate, I don't yearn for a life on the other end... except for your red bean soup, I really like that.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I've once seen the warm and bright beings, what you call hope and love, but they all disappeared without exception. In this world, those things are more fragile than illusions. None can ever stay.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: You and I belong to different worlds. Darkness comes along with my steps, and you should walk in the light. But I will protect you from this end. The abyss is enough with me in it, no one can drag you in. This is... a lifetime order I've placed for myself.

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Didn't expect you here. New orders? Or just looking to hide as well?

default.title: Idle
default.text: ...Who will break first, this blade or me?

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: You seem anxious. Do you need me to do something?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Order accepted, payments upfront.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Here you go, remember to settle the balance.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Staring at me won't help, you can't catch up with my movements. If I want to leave, you can't keep me.

lurking_lotusblade.title: Level Up
lurking_lotusblade.text: My blade is unsheathed, my strike is true.

lurking_lotusblade.title: Pat Head
lurking_lotusblade.text: I recognized your scent, which is why you're still alive. Had it been someone else, they would've sunk into the pond and turned into mud.

lurking_lotusblade.title: Obtain Attire
lurking_lotusblade.text: All threats clearedâ€”at your request. Now I need to take a break. Your backyard seems quiet. Mind if I stay?

lurking_lotusblade.title: Greeting
lurking_lotusblade.text: No commissions today, so I'm here for a break. Hmm, it's quite tranquil here. I like it.

lurking_lotusblade.title: Ordinary Contact 1
lurking_lotusblade.text: Even just casually passing by causes a commotion. What trouble did you get yourself into...? Never mind, it's not my business.

lurking_lotusblade.title: Ordinary Contact 2
lurking_lotusblade.text: I don't really care about justice. I side with whoever hires me, and get my job done. The only thing I care about... maybe the price?

lurking_lotusblade.title: Ordinary Contact 3
lurking_lotusblade.text: A blade conceals, not kills. Just like I lurk in your courtyard, and you lie low behind me. Revealing too much will only make you an easy target.

lurking_lotusblade.title: Ordinary Contact 4
lurking_lotusblade.text: No need to tidy up your backyard. I like things to be... chaotically ordered. Hmm, it feels familiar, like home.

lurking_lotusblade.title: Idle
lurking_lotusblade.text: If you need to be somewhere else, help yourself. I'm fine staying alone.

lurking_lotusblade.title: Special Attention
lurking_lotusblade.text: In our line of work, face and identity are our biggest secret. You wouldn't want to know what happened to the last person who stared at me like that... But, you'll keep this secret for me, right? After all, I do like your courtyard, and I hope to see you again the next time I come back.
